typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> EmployeeData
source(output(
		depid as string,
		depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DepartmentData
EmployeeData, DepartmentData join(department == depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEmpDeptData
JoinEmpDeptData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empanddepData  '],
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		EmpName = name,
		country,
		depname
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OutputData
